p.s: What does Nick want from me?
It cantcan't be anything bad, can it?
If it would be, Jordan would have told me, since she is my best friend and is dating him right now.
And he also wouldn't just invite me over for tea.
Why couldn't I also not bring Tom along, maybe he wants to tell me something about him, maybe he knows something about his affair.
What's going on why was he chuckling, there is something weird going on.
I know this face!
It's Jay!
Where was he?
I thought he was dead.
He looks so good and also rich.
Something must have happendhappened to him.
I am so excited to see him again, it was wrong to marry Tom, I should just have waited for him.
But why is he here, what does that mean?
I really missed him.
Why isn't he hardly talking at all?
Am I doing something wrong?
Oh, what does Nick want to talk to him about?
I am so happy to see him again.
I thought I would never see him again.
I wanna hug him right now.
But it feels wrong.
I know that, Tom cheats on me but still I married him and we are still married now.
We didn't divorce yet.
If Jay still loves me I will try my hardest to break up my marriage.
Ah, there he is.
Where is Nick?
Oh, I don't even really care.
Right now, it's just me and Jay.
When I look back he was the only one who ever loved me.
Tom never really loved me.
I was just a show off for him.
But where was he all that time?
All these 5 years.
He was rich, but why did he never came to visit me.
Tom could do nothing against him.
He was officer in the army.
He is a real man.
Ah there is Nick again, where even was he.
Oh, hethe sun came out, this brightens up my mood even more.
Wow, the weather looks great.
Oh my God, yes.
I really wanna see Jay's house.
Maybe it can be a comfortable living place.
I should ask Nick how it looks.
Or I should have asked Jordan, since she is a real flapper.
I don't think his house can be as big as mine.
Tom is one of the richest person in East Egg and here is just West Egg where new wealthy people live.
He can't be as rich as Tom or richer, can he?
